item.title: Learning `map()` in javaScript
item.description: Reading List Date Title Author URL 2017-05-31 Master Map & Filter, Javascriptâ€™s Most Powerful Array Functions Arnav Aggarwal Link 2014-02-24 how do you pass an array as a parameter in a function? Dave McFarland Link Summary This article adopts a specific-to-abstract 4-stage approach to explain array functions. A quasi-map function is developed from multiplying each items in arr by 3.

item.title: First Step to API
item.description: Newbie’s notes about API What is API? An Introduction to API by Brian Cooksey ebook

item.title: Start Blogging with Hugo
item.description: Start Blogging with Hugo Why blogging? There are several good reasons to blog: Build my memory palace A personal blog enables you to organize content in a fully customized fashion. This makes it easier to collect and retrieve information for later use. Express myself with clarity Writing is the best way to capture diffusing thoughts and fleeting inspirations. Play with self-hosting Self-hosting sounds cool.
